lyrics.text:
Pule’anga ‘o e Lang
i
,
Ko e hā ha me’a nai
Te tau fakatātā’ak
i
‘Ene ngāue ‘oku fai?
Ko e fu’u uloa ia
Ha’o ‘a e fa’ahinga ik
a
;
Faifai toho pe ki ‘ut
a
,
Ha’u ai ‘a e kakai ‘o tuf
a
.

Mou vakai pe ‘a e Sias
i
,
He kupenga ‘o e lang
i
,
‘Ene ha’o ha fonua
‘I he ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua.
Fuofua ta’e’iloa,
Hangē ‘ene folofol
a
:
Faifai faha pe ki ‘ut
a
,
‘Iloange kuo mo’u
a
.

Ko e anga ia ‘o Tong
a
‘I he tō mai ‘a e uloa;
‘Ikai si’i te nau ongo’
i
,
‘Iloange kuo ha’o’
i
.
Loki mai ki he lelei,
Tapu pē ‘a e hiteni,
‘Efihia ‘etau mo’u
i
‘I he ngaahi tu’utu’un
i
.

Anga ia ‘o kita fok
i
;
Fuoloa ‘ikai ongo’
i
,
Tā ki liku tā ki ‘a
o
,
‘I he’ete ngāue pang
o
.
‘Ofa ē ka ko ha ʻof
a
!
Hoto toho he uloa
Mei he houhou ‘o māmani
Ki he ‘uta ‘o e Lang
i
. *
Origins of this hymn
